commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Perform macro on selection if present

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add missing replace string to Format Compressed macro
commits.body: This has been made necessary by textmate/textmate@ec37b09faf4cd88f1908e6701e1c7cd437c33f32

commits.author: Adam Strzelecki
commits.summary: Color Picker: Lowercase output on lowercase input
commits.body:
If user uses lowercase CSS color notation, i.e. #fff then probably wants
lowercase output as well. Try to detect that.

commits.author: Adam Strzelecki
commits.body: Previously #fff or #fafafa were not detected as valid CSS color entries.
